line.text: What's going on...?
I feel a terrible headache... How did I end up this way?
My memory is fuzzy, however, I remember her clearly.
I feel like I've lived this before. Deja-vu?
Everything is getting dark suddenly. My time is up...
Nothing remarkable here...
Fire in the hole!
The water is hot...I probably was about to take a bath.
Fast food would be the perfect choice right now...ba dum tss.
I'm running out of time.
No time to loosen up!
This window is always closed and I don't remember opening it up.
My wardrobe...I think.
The door is locked I need something to open it.
The nearest hospital is too far away.
An statue of her. There's a date carved on the base: 'February 16th.'
She beautiful, isn't she...?
This shelf is filled with my books, there's only one book missing.
I remember now!
The panic room door is behind this bookshelf, I need the missing book to open it!
A big and heavy book.
I wonder how many pages I could read before the poison kills me.
I see a can of olives and some food leftovers.
The cat looks very upset, it looks like it won't let me grab him.
